title: Halloween Game Jam Announcement!
body:
Join the Halloween Game Jam!

Create a spooky game! The theme is Halloween. Submit your game for a chance to be featured on CCPorted, with a link to your chosen destination (within reason). Three winners will be selected!

  • Build a web game
  • Theme: Halloween
  • Single player
  • Three winners

Submit your game by October 31 at midnight.
Submit your game here
